actions.recommendation: You scored in the moderate risk category for cardiovascular risk. For you to decrease this risk - decrease weight, exercise, decrease BP and cholesterol markers
Your uric acid & inflammatory markers are raised - decrease alcohol use, decrease red meat intake, take methylated B vitamins (Metagenics Phyto-multi is a good option)
Your liver markers were raised. Please stop alcohol use and repeat these readings in 6 weeks time - if still raised to investigate further
Your haemoglobin was raised - I would suggest repeating the full blood count and for it to be reviewed with the consulting haematologist if still abnormal.
Your lipogram is deranged - Dietician seen, please decrease alcohol consumption, take 2-4gâ€™s of Omega 3 supplement and repeat cholesterol in 3/12
